original_title: Coldplay: A Head Full of Dreams
overview: An in-depth and intimate portrait of Coldplay's spectacular rise from the backrooms of Camden pubs to selling out stadiums across the planet. At the heart of the story is the band's unshakeable brotherhood which has endured through many highs and lows.
tagline: The Inside Story. Filmed Over 20 Years.
title: Coldplay: A Head Full of Dreams
